XenotypeDef.label: faun
XenotypeDef.description: A humanoid sentient species sharing many characteristics with that of a deer. They generally have a subservient nature to them which led to a complicated hierarchy based society where several tiers of noble class exist, each one ruling those below them. Their physical attributes make them agile however they suffer from a weaker immune system than most.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A humanoid sentient species sharing many characteristics with that of a deer.
